name: Beer Pong Extreme (FREE)
description:
Welcome to the professional sport known as Beer Pong Extreme (FREE)!!

With this version of Beer Pong Extreme you will have access to 2 game modes, Classic Pong and Basket Pong, both of which are great on their own, both of which you can play forever, however game modes will not be included, nor will new features to this version.

Please note: This game is intended to be played against friends locally, however, a single player mode may be added in the future for the paid version.

Go head to head against your friends in the best mobile Beer Pong game ever made in the history of mankind! (to date)

Download it for an iOS device here!
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id1141733593
